it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view

Class TurnFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view.TurnFrame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefinitiveAlienTurnFrame, DefinitiveHumanTurnFrame

    public abstract class TurnFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Main game Frame

      • TurnFrame

        public TurnFrame(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String actualPosition,
                 java.lang.String turn)
        Constructor, it initialize the Frame with the start game informations
        Parameters:
        name - player's name
        actualPosition - player's actual position
        turn - game's current turn

    • Method Detail

      • commonBuildUp

        public void commonBuildUp(java.lang.String imagePath,
                          java.awt.Color commColor)
        Initializes all the components of the Frame, differentiating them on the base of the parameters received to grant a different visualization for alien and human players
        Parameters:
        imagePath - the path of the image representing a human or an alien
        commColor - the color used for buttons and text area

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String position,
                   java.lang.String turn,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> objects,
                   boolean startTurn)
        Update the view with to respond to in-game changes
        Parameters:
        name - player's name
        position - player's actual position
        turn - game's current turn
        objects - a String list with the names of the currently owned items
        startTurn - signals if the update has been received at the beginning of the turn or not

      • setCardHandler

        protected abstract java.util.List<javax.swing.JLabel> setCardHandler()
        Obtains the labels on which the card image are
        Returns:
        the list of JLabel representing card images

      • enlightCard

        public void enlightCard(int index)
        Substitutes the image of a card with his negative.

        Method is called by the MouseListeners on the label, granting the effect of "enlight" the card anytime mouse passes or does a particular action on this label

        Parameters:
        index - the index of which card image has to be enlighted

      • endarkCard

        public void endarkCard(int index)
        Substitutes the negative image of a card with his original.

        Method is called by the MouseListeners on the label, granting the effect of "endark" the card anytime mouse goes away or does a particular action on this label

        Parameters:
        index - the index of which card image has to be enlighted

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getItem()
